TextView.android:text: SECTION 1: KNOWLEDGE OF MODERN METHODS OF DELAYING OR POST PONDING PREGNANCY
Do you know any modern methods of delaying or post ponding pregnancy?
If Yes, Please List The Modern Methods Of Contraception You Know. Do Not Read Out. If More Than One Method Is Mentioned, Select All That Apply. If No skip to Section 2, question 4
How do you know about the modern methods of delaying or post ponding pregnancy? (select all that apply)
Do you know any side effect of these modern methods of delaying or post ponding pregnancy?
If yes, please list the side effect you know (select all that apply)
SECTION 2: ATTITUDE TOWARDS DELAYING OR POST PONDING PREGNANCY
Do you use or intend to use any modern method of delaying or post ponding pregnancy?
What are your reasons for using modern methods of delaying or post ponding pregnancy?.(select all that apply)
How important do you think is of delaying or post ponding pregnancy for married couple?
How effective do you think modern methods are in delaying or post ponding pregnancy?
What is your main concern/fears (if any) about using modern methods of delaying or post ponding pregnancy? (select all that apply)
SECTION 3: PRACTICE OF DELAYING OR POST PONDING PREGNANCY
Are you currently using a modern method of delaying or post ponding pregnancy?
If yes, which method are you using? (Select all that specify)
If no, what is the reason for not using? ( select all that apply)
Who between you and your husband typically makes decisions about of delaying or post ponding pregnancy?
Do you plan to use a modern method of delaying or post ponding pregnancy in the future?
If yes, which method are you considering? (Select all that apply)
